name: cycle | bot
description:
Controls:
Use  or arrow keys to move.
Hold or to pause.
Press to restart current level.

Cyclebot needs help traversing the floors of the warehouse to reach the end. Enter directional commands which Cyclebot will repeat and try to help it reach the yellow elevator at the end of each level! Reach the end in as few steps as possible and you will have a happy robot in this lighthearted puzzle game.

Cyclebot can enter the elevator from any direction.

THE TOOLS ARE JUST THERE FOR DECORATION THEY DON'T MATTER FOR GAMEPLAY (playtesting showed this statement is necessary)
